content:
{"name": "More In My Basket - Charlotte SNAP Assistance (Helpline)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit"https://northcarolina.summerebtapp.com/begin
MIMB staff can:
* Answer questions about FNS/ SNAP
* Complete an eligibility screening
* Provide assistance with completing the FNS/SNAP application
* Contact us by calling toll free at 1-855-240-1451 or 1-888-382-7105 (para ayuda en español) or filling out the contact form below and a representative will respond as soon as possible

**NOTE**: More In My Basket provide over-the-phone assistance (not in person). They can assist anyone within North Carolina by checking the eligibility and by sending a packet for you that can be filled out before going to the County offices.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.morefood.org/using-snap/connect-with-snap/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "Raleigh Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Charlotte", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2528436, "longitude": -80.79209879999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(855) 240-1451", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
